Description:
Large land of endless opportunity
Perfectly located close to all amenities, this family home offers endless opportunity to an astute buyer or developer to live, rent and or redevelop into dual occupancy dwellings (STCA). Sitting on large block of 636 sq m (approximately) it's a land of opportunity for buyers who are looking for something special in the heart of Epping close to all amenities in a family friendly court location. This three bedroom family home boasts a versatile light filled floorplan including master bedroom walk in robe, other two bedrooms with BIR, formal lounge, central bathroom, separate laundry, Quality kitchen with plenty of cabinet space with SS appliances overlooking family and dining area. Other features includes large outdoor entertainment area, secured parking, split system heating and cooling & a massive backyard with future potential. Close to all the amenities such as Epping plaza, Westfield shopping centre, Epping & South Morang train stations, buses, local schools, child care, parklands, health and recreational facilities etc. all at your door step. Inspection is a must.
Insights: 21 Orlit Court, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2018 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Location, Space & Comfort
This home is positioned in a highly sought after pocket in Epping. Offering 5 bedrooms, main bedroom with full en-suite, multiple living areas filled with natural light & beautifully appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. Stepping outside is where you will find the under cover entertainment area, complete with beautiful landscaped yet low maintenance garden. Further features include the comforts of ducted heating, cooling, outdoor spa, double garage, shed & ample storage throughout the house. All this on a large allotment of 561m2 plus positioned only minutes away from Epping Plaza & Westfield Shopping Centre, schools, parkland and public transport. Be quick to inspect before it's gone!

Description:
All The Ingredients For A Perfect Family Home
Have the opportunity to be the envy of all your family and friends with this charming brick veneer home, on a 539sqm. block approx., boasts four double bedrooms with BIR's, master with WIR and ensuite, sunken formal lounge, open fire place, beautifully appointed kitchen, stainless steel appliances, loads of storage and bench space, dining and expansive living to accommodate the largest of families. Features include alarm system, down lights, colour bond fencing, window shutters, ducted heating and wide side drive to double garage. All set within close proximity to Meadow Glen primary school, parks, Epping plaza, Greenbrook shopping centre, local bus service and train station.

Description:
Excellent Lifestyle Appeal
A wonderful free flowing floorplan introducing formal lounge, family meals, a very generous casual living-zone and a decked alfresco area, covered for
year-round use...this stylish home has everything you need for a superb start in a sought-after location.
Set in the Aurora Estate, an easy walk to parks, a choice of primary schools, local cafe, Coles, Aldi and the bus, the living areas are complemented by a sleek contemporary kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and three bedrooms including main with walk-in robe and ensuite.
The low maintenance rear yard includes a separate service yard. Opening off the laundry it is fenced for visual appeal, and to ensure the dog doesn't get to the washing.
With extras of ducted heating and cooling, alarm, NBN, inbuilt speakers to casual and formal living and a double garage with internal access, it's a winner for the beginner, a delightful downsizer or ideal investment.

Description:
Classic Investment Opportunity!
This deceptively spacious home enjoys the benefits of a central location allowing a stroll to take you to an abundance of amenities.
Offering wide entrance foyer to open plan kitchen, stainless steel appliances, gas top stove, rangehood, loads of bench space, meals area, adjoining spacious lounge, separate laundry facilities, modern bathroom and sizeable master bedroom with BIR, overlooking the expansive courtyard. Ideal for the entertaining, also features split system and side drive to carport.
For those looking to invest you could expect a rental return of $15,000 p.a. approx., all within walking distance to Epping Plaza, primary/secondary schools, train station, buses, parks, hospital and easy access to the Western Ring Road, which will certainly impress the most astute home buyer.

Investors Invited !
Whether you are looking to expand your property portfolio, or for a first place to call home, this is the one for you. Located in the heart of the ever sought after suburb of Epping, this beautiful two bedroom two bathroom residence has everything to suit your needs. The marvelously designed floor plan spreads out the living areas in an open plan style of living for the ground floor, the opulent light that pours in through the courtyard and windows further emphasizes the amount of space this beautiful property has to offer. Two master bedrooms both complete with an ensuite.
extras include down lights throughout, Alarm system, Central heating, beautiful outdoor court yard. There is no body corporate applicable to this property.

Description:
Spacious Family Entertainer In The Heart Of Lyndarum!
This imposing 35sq(approx) double storey home's sophisticated style reflects uncompromising commitment to quality inside and out. Meticulously maintained and perfectly positioned in the prestigious Lyndarum Estate surrounded by parklands and only minutes away from the new Aurora Town Centre, Lyndarum shops, choice of private and public schools, playgrounds and transport. Upstairs comprises 5 large bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR and a family bathroom. Downstairs space and light are maximised by the high ceilings and is defined by its impressive proportions and elegant style boasting spacious formal lounge, powder room, large laundry, gourmet kitchen with 900mm S/S appliances including dishwasher and stone bench tops is a cooks delight and overlooks the meals and family area out to the alfresco and low maintenance backyard. Ducted heating, alarm system, evaporative cooling and double garage with remote access complete the home. Inspection will impress!

Description:
Huge Town Home, Massive Opportunity
A rare opportunity to purchase a larger than most town home in a highly sought after Epping location with park frontage. This quality home redefines low maintenance family living. Showcasing three very large bedrooms with BIR's, master with ensuite, WIR and balcony overlooking magnificent parklands. Central bathroom upstairs, toilet downstairs, kitchen loaded with stainless steel appliances, pantry and dishwasher neighbouring an enormous living and dining area that flows out to a picturesque decked alfresco area which provides limitless room to entertain effortlessly on special occasions with family and friends.
Enjoy all the feature comforts including heating and cooling, alarm system, laundry with storage and external access, an impressive study/retreat upstairs and a double car lock-up garage.
Finished with an emphasis on enormity and located just minutes to Lyndarum shopping precinct, Pacific Epping, schools and public transport makes this a special buy that will capture the interest of any first home owner, family or investor.
Get into the market with style, invest with confidence or create your perfect lifestyle.

Description:
Perfect family home!
Immaculately presented with multiple living areas, this spacious home located in one of Epping's most sought after areas is an opportunity not to be missed. This beautiful home comprises of 4 large bedrooms: Master with en-suite and WIR, formal lounge and an open plan living, dining and kitchen area making entertaining a breeze. The modern kitchen with 900ml S/S appliances comprises ample cupboard and bench space. Separating the dual living zones is the beautiful undercover pergola perfect for entertaining. Seamless transition from inside to outside to a low maintenance backyard for kids to play. Additional features include ducted heating, cooling, electric security roller shutters to windows,double garage and much more. A complete family home situated close to all important amenities, walking distance to schools, shops and public transport at your door step.

Character and Flair on 691m2
A family home to be proud of in the exciting "Epping Central" location. Presented to please with an abundance of new features including updated kitchen with s/s cooking appliances and dishwasher, new carpets and blinds, and huge brand new ensuite to master bedroom.
Set on a huge block of land in a quiet court location and within walking distance to Epping Train Staion, St Monicas College, Dalton Village and Pacific Epping Shopping Centre to name a few. Enjoy the convenience of ducted heating and cooling, solar electricity, private alfresco, slate tiling, huge lounge with catheral ceilings and landscaped gardens. Explore the opportunities for future subdivision (S.T.C.A). A great family home or ideal investment.
Just one look is all you need.

Description:
Brilliant Home, Prime Location
This stunning and appealing four bedroom home will excite your senses and take your breath away with its warm interior, stunning street appeal and genuine low maintenance everyday living for those of us with busy social lives.
Close proximity to Epping Plaza, Westfield Shopping Complex, South Morang & Epping train stations,1.2kms from Epping North Shopping Centre and Lyndarum Market, 1.4kms to Epping Views Primary school, cafes, restaurants, parks and surrounded by the area's best amenities.
An open plan living and functionality that will suit larger and extended family living arrangements.
Stunning kitchen with island bench, quality appliances including dishwasher, pantry & breakfast bar that overlooks the adjoining, family, dining, large rumpus and alfresco area.
The master bedroom is a huge comfortable room with loads of space and a sumptuous en suite.
Features include evaporative cooling, ducted heating, engineered floating floors, multiple living areas, internal access remote double garage, down lights, extensive paving, solar panels, BBQ area, gazebo and established gardens on all a 578sqm block.
Absolutely nothing to spend, inspections will delight!

Description:
Ready To Meet The Needs Of Modern Family Living
Style, size and sophistication come together to excite and entice discerning buyers looking to make this premium property in the sought-after Aurora Estate home.
Positioned for easy living, parks, early learning centre, supermarket, cafes and the primary school are all within a few minutes walk, drive or bike ride. Formal
lounge-dining complements family-living meals which includes a striking kitchen fitted with quality stainless steel appliances and a huge island bench. Sliding doors allow for seamless access to the first of the two alfresco areas. Sunny and bright, and perfect for morning coffee, it heads a pathway to the second entertainment area at the rear of the house. Paved, covered and with landscaped designer touches, this generous zone is ideal for large gatherings with family and friends, all year round.
The main bedroom features an ensuite with oversize shower, the remaining three bedrooms are just footsteps away from the family bathroom. With refrigerated ducted heating and cooling, six star energy rating, a huge walk in linen cupboard, recycled watering system for the landscaped gardens and shed complementing a remote double garage offering all weather ease of internal access designer living in a desired location is yours.

Description:
Contemporary Quality Build
Presenting a fine quality built Meletis "Mistique" home where no expense has been spared. Only 7 years young and built to excellent taste, this impressive ensemble offers the most comfortable contemporary living situated in the popular Lyndarum Estate.
Within a minute's walking distance from the local café and schools, a minute's drive to the new Aurora Village Shops and parklands directly opposite, the location cannot be beaten.
The home starts off by offering attractive landscaped front garden area using only Australian native plants. Upon entry be impressed by the open spaces of the kitchen, dining and living areas under cathedral ceilings, all upon polished quality solid hardwood timber flooring throughout.
The well appointed kitchen offers the luxuries any chef would be comfortable working with including stone top benches, 900mm 6 burner gas Smeg stovetop, Smeg dishwasher and oven as well as a walk in butler's pantry.
Offering 3 good sized bedrooms, all with built in robes, master with walk in and ensuite featuring a double shower and separate spa bath.
Enjoy dining in the private alfresco area all upon Modwood decking, a second decked area along the side of the house with side gate access and a rear ample courtyard area. Ticking all the boxes for your new home.
Additional features throughout the home include:
Crimsafe security doors
Split system air conditioning throughout
Ceiling fans throughout
Double block out blinds throughout
Front door camera and intercom system
Alarm system
Victory Blinds and curtains throughout
Plenty of storage throughout
Double remote garage with drive through
Termite treated slab
18 x solar panels to significantly reduce electricity costs
Double glazed windows and doors throughout
30% wool Batts insulation
Grey water system in place

Description:
Quality, Space & Location!
Perfectly set amongst quality and established homes, within walking distance to all surrounding amenities including shops, schools, Cafes, transport, parkland, medical clinic, Lyndarum Town Centre & a short drive to Epping Plaza Shopping Centre & Epping Train Station.
This spacious home built by porter davis, features 4 generous-sized bedrooms, master includes walk in robe, full ensuite, double vanity & over sized shower. Modern kitchen with its stainless steel appliances, stone bench top, dishwasher and walk in pantry. The presence of three separate natural light-filled living zones and a huge alfresco/outdoor entertainment area with landscaped gardens highlights the home's practicality and functionality for everyday family living.
Further features include the comforts of formal lounge, large rumpus room, ducted heating, remote control double garage, sparkling central bathroom and much more. Have a look today, before it sells!

Description:
Neat, Sweet & Totally Complete
Situated in a quiet residential location, within close proximity to all your local amenities such as public transport with bus stop within walking distance, Epping Train Station, Primary and Secondary schools, Parklands, bike path to Epping Station and so much more!
This immaculately presented family home boasts four large bedrooms with BIR's, with ensuite to the master bedroom and walk in robe, serviced by a bright filled central bathroom, separate sitting media room which is great for the kids or the grownups, huge open plan living area, spacious kitchen with ample storage overlooking the vast dining area. And there's more
Step outside relax and enjoy the huge undercover alfresco area complete and ready for you to entertain family and friends with your very own wood fire pizza oven and service bar.
Further features include ducted heating, split system cooling, double car garage, full side drive access, front porch, veggie patch, and well-manicured gardens front and back.
Land size: 612sqm approx.
It's Time Don't miss this rare opportunity!

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is
correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies.
Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Unpolished Diamond!!!
Bring back the sparkle to this perfectly positioned 3-bedroom plus study home with a little TLC! Upon entry, a generous formal lounge; accompanied by a smartly presented kitchen showcasing stainless steel appliances, flowing on to the spacious meals/living area. The master bedroom includes a walk-in robe and full en-suite.
Further highlights include sweeping floorboards, central heating, split system cooling and double remote-control garage.
Exceptionally located in the Aurora Estate, the property is surrounded by parks, schools, new shopping centre and with is easy access to the Western Ring Road.
Whether you're in the market for your first property, looking to increase your property portfolio, this great value home is waiting for you. So be quick and inspect now!!!
